title: free gift-wrapping
heading1: With only a bill from 200.000đ, get a free gift-wrapping offer now
text1: Every little friend loves to receive cute, lovely, love-filled gifts from the giver.
text2: At Yay - For Kids, we understand that and are always dedicated in every gift package.
text3: With each bill from only 200,000 VND, customers will receive a part of Free Gift Package.
text4: Please make a note when purchasing, or contact Yay - For Kids via communication channels (hotline, zalo, facebook) to receive this offer.
text9: Yay wraps themed gifts through each festival season, hoping to always be a bridge to send customers' feelings to the recipient.
text10: Beautiful gift wrapping through the festive seasons
